title: SPDR Portfolio Small Cap (SPSM) Shares Cross Above 200 DMA - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of the SPDR Portfolio Small Cap ETF (Symbol: SPSM) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $29.78, changing hands as high as $30.03 per share. SPDR Portfolio Small Cap shares are currently trading up about 2.3% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of SPSM shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, SPSM's low point in its 52 week range is $24.79 per share, with $33.97 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $30.05.
